channel.title: Node Operational Logs on
channel.description: Recent content in Node Operational Logs on

item.title: Review Node Events
item.description: When troubleshooting a problem on edge or gateway nodes, reviewing node events can provide critical information about the nature of the problem. Choose the node that may be causing the problem Scroll down to Events Look for any critical problems Events for the currently viewed node For issues affecting multiple nodes, review events across the organization to detect patterns or issues. Choose the Operations tab View Events across the organization Organization wide events

item.title: Debug Logs
item.description: What are debug logs? Debug log files contain detailed technical information about the operation of a Trustgrid node. They are useful for Trustgrid support engineers to troubleshoot issues. If your node is experiencing problems, generating logs at that time may help identify the root cause. Generating Log Files The Debug Log button is located in the top right of a Node Details page. Debug Logs button The Debug Log dialogue will show any previously generated log files.
